actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to clarify the treatment of Guam banks as Guam corporations with respect to the taxation of passive income received from sources within the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from the tax on foreign corporations connected with U.S. business any interest on U.S. obligations received by banks organized in Guam.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to clarify the treatment of Guam banks as Guam corporations with respect to the taxation of passive income received from sources within the United States.
